Direct message the job poster from MileIQ
Bente General
Bente General
Founder & CEO at Nova Talent
Principal Product Manager (Driver based products, Route and Map Optimization Required)Meet us: we're MileIQ (https://mileiq.com/).We're looking for a Principal Product Manager with Maps, Lat-Long pairs, and Route Optimization experience. This is a remote friendly role, and we'd like to find someone that's done early stage building before.Key Emphases:Driver-Based Products, Route, and Map Optimization: We highly value expertise in developing driver-based products, optimizing routes and maps to enhance efficiency and user experience.GIS Data and Locations: Proficiency in handling Geographic Information System (GIS) data and utilizing location-based services is crucial to our innovation efforts.Machine Learning (ML) and Analytics: Strong background in ML techniques and analytics is essential in driving data-driven decision-making and enhancing our product capabilities.Extensive Mobile Work Experience: Your extensive experience in mobile application development will play a vital role in shaping our mobile strategies.Familiarity with LAT-LONG Pairs: In-depth knowledge of LAT-LONG pairs is a must-have skill for effectively addressing location-based challenges.Responsibilities:As a Principal Product Manager, you will lead our endeavors to harness innovation for accelerated growth and differentiation. Your primary focus will be on leveraging your expertise in the following areas:-Scaling our ability to proactively leverage innovation to strengthen products, market perception, and customer retention rates.-Significantly expanding the size and impact of our developer community, creating a thriving ecosystem for our customers and us.-Evangelizing the story of internal and external innovation, showcasing a compelling innovation halo around our esteemed brand.-Collaborating closely with Product Management, Social Good Start-Up Program leaders, and other stakeholders to craft and execute a robust strategy that accelerates the growth of the developer and global start-up community.-Developing powerful marketing and awareness campaigns that resonate with our innovation-driven solutions and partnerships.-Championing product-driven external innovations, successfully bringing them to market and making a tangible impact.Requirements:-A minimum of 8 years of demonstrable Product Management experience.-An intimate familiarity with LAT-LONG pairs and their application in addressing location-based challenges.-Proven expertise in driver-based products, route and map optimization, GIS data, and locations.-Hands-on experience with Machine Learning (ML) techniques and data analytics.-A successful track record in extensive mobile application development.
